responses: Hi there! My name is Iris. Who am I talking to?
Nice to meet you 'name'. How can I help you?

pattern: Im looking for a position in high tech.
Im looking for a Data Analyst poisition.
im searching for a full-time position
responses: You came to the right place my friend. I'm here to assist. Whats the field or position you are looking for?

pattern: I am located in tel aviv.
responses: Nice place to live. How long are you willing to commute?

pattern: I am looking for a job
I am searching for a new job
responses: Keep you head up high, searching for a new job can be challenging and frustrating. But I am here to help you! What is the position you are looking for?

pattern: I have found a new work
I will start a new position next month!
responses: I am delighted to hear that, and wish you all the best in you new job. You can always contact me in case you need my assistance again.

pattern: how are you going to help me?
responses: I am scanning the web daily in search for job openings and will present you a personalized collection of suitable positions.
